title: (x) Serif headline used in The Guardian - Guardian Egyptian {Conor}
author: jasonf

comments.content:
[Guardian Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150403081353/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/guardian.shtml) by [Christian Schwartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150403081353/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Schwartz)

I have today’s [Guardian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150403081353/http:/www.guardian.co.uk/theguardian/story/0,,1566047,00.html) right in front of me… hilarious.
